岅字的基本解释

岅
bǎn
同“坂”。

岅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎn］
［《廣韻》扶板切，上潸，並。］
［《廣韻》府遠切，上阮，非。］
［《集韻》部版切，上潸，並。］
亦作“岅1”。
(1)山坡；斜坡。
(2)山腰小道。
(3)通“反”。与“正”相对。引申指邪术。

岅字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岅； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页308第04
【正字通】與阪坂同。

Basic explanation of words

bǎn

岅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎn］
["Guang Yun" cut the board with the help of the board, go up, and merge. ]
["Guangyun" Fu Yuanqie, Shangruan, Fei. ]
["Jiyun" section cut, Shanglu, combined. ]
Also known as "岅1".
(1) Hillside; slope.
(2) Mountainside trail.
(3) Through "anti". Contrast with "positive". The extension refers to sorcery.
